author: Bellular News
description:
Use code BELLULARNEWS at the link below to get an exclusive 60% off an annual Incogni plan: https://incogni.com/bellularnews Sponsored by Incogni.

Steam lost PayPal for most countries. A dev has £80,000 frozen. And that's just the beginning: we have Valve's admission, government petitions hitting thresholds, and proof the financial system is attacking gaming.
